# Blow gun
## Overview
Blowguns are generally used to deliver debilitating (but rarely fatal) poisons from a distance. They are nearly silent when fired. For a list of appropriate poisons, see *PF Core Rulebook*, pg. 559.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Ranged Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** |  |
| | Blowgun | 2 gp | 1 | 1d2 | 2 | 20 ft. | 1 lb. | P |  |

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 145
